item.title: Marcus add a quote by Ellen Kennedy
item.description:
"i don't want to hate the president
i don't want to go to harvard
i don't want to win the pulitzer prize
i just want to sit in my bathtub
and think about relationships i will never have
with people i will never meet
and then go lay in my bed
with a magnifying glass
and count all the stiches in my sheets
until i fall asleep
and wake up
to repeat again." -- Ellen Kennedy

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "I will always be the virgin-prostitute, the perverse angel, the two-faced sinister and saintly woman." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I want To do with you what spring does with the cherry trees." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Christy Leigh Stewart
item.description: "The concept of virginity is a social construct. If you’re wondering if my commercial value, self-respect, and/or quality of my immortal soul has been affected by things that have gone in or out of my vagina the answer is no." -- Christy Leigh Stewart

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Emma Chase
item.description: "Old women have a thing for me. And I don't mean a pinch-my-cheek, pat-my-head kind of thing. I mean a grab-my-ass, rub-my-junk, why-don't-you-push-my-wheelchair-into-the-broom-closet-so-we-can-get-nasty kind of thing. It's f*cking disturbing." -- Emma Chase

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Frances Winkler
item.description: "I don't mean like balls-in-your-face or gifts of pornography and butt plugs romantic, just cute, over-the-pants, PG-13 movie stuff." -- Frances Winkler

item.title: Marcus add a quote by leonard cohen
item.description: "a kite is a victim you are sure of. you love it because it pulls." -- leonard cohen

item.title: Marcus add a quote by George Elliott Clarke
item.description: "All books are merely delayed dust." -- George Elliott Clarke

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Harmony Korine
item.description: "I never cared so much about making perfect sense. I wanted to make perfect nonsense. I wanted to tell jokes, but I didn't give a fuck about the punchline. " -- Harmony Korine

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Cameron Pierce
item.description: "What you were is what a part of you will always be." -- Cameron Pierce

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "A man's got to take a lot of punishment to write a really funny book." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Sam Pink
item.description: "My ideal date would involve painful silence. My ideal date wouldn't involve me." -- Sam Pink

item.title: Marcus add a quote by Sam Pink
item.description: "Three days ago, I was fired from my job teaching at a college because one of my students bet me that you don’t cum when you get a prostate exam and it took me seven minutes to prove that dumb fucking kid wrong. It was hard to touch my own prostate, but ultimately, I was correct. I came onto the floor and onto the person in the desk up front. I said, “Kids, that is what is known as ‘empirical evidence’." -- Sam Pink
